name: Deflecting Manipulative Language
description: Techniques for identifying and neutralizing manipulation in real-time without escalating conflicts.

cards.title: Spotting Conversational Traps
cards.description: Recognizing subtle manipulative tactics in everyday conversations.
bulletpoints: Identifying linguistic tricks like false dilemmas, guilt-tripping, and forced agreement.
Detecting presuppositions embedded in statements that lead to undesired outcomes.
Recognizing when emotional appeals are used to bypass logical reasoning.

cards.title: The Art of the Non-Response
cards.description: Using silence, ambiguity, and neutrality to shut down manipulation.
bulletpoints: Leveraging strategic pauses to make manipulators uncomfortable.
Using non-committal responses to avoid being led into a trap.
Practicing verbal minimalism to neutralize probing or leading questions.

cards.title: Flipping the Frame
cards.description: Reversing manipulative narratives by shifting the conversational frame.
bulletpoints: Recognizing when a manipulator is dictating the frame of discussion.
Countering accusations with reframing techniques that redirect the burden.
Asking disruptive questions that force the manipulator to re-evaluate their position.
